item.title: By: Aaron
item.dc:creator: Aaron
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/blog/index.php/archives/388/comment-page-1#comment-3417">Malli</a>.
How are you hosting this?
You'll either need to host it and have the GetWeather.ashx on the same domain or use a cross domain file to access the data.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Malli.

How are you hosting this?

You’ll either need to host it and have the GetWeather.ashx on the same domain or use a cross domain file to access the data.

item.title: By: Malli

item.description:
